ki kbhi usse koi ka kbhi ka chutta karwa leta hai main will hun jo month end hone pe ye sochta hai ki baar saving account minimum balance maintain hoga ya nahi ya baar walo ne kitna tax kaata hoga wheeler pe nikalta hai kbhi mercede ko side deta hai kbhi fortuner ko gaadi koi bhi brand ki ho bewajah side hota mai hi hoon bheed dekhi hogi na aapne bheed se koi bhi working class ko dekh lijiye jindgi bhar ghut ghut ke marte rahna chahiye tha mujhedusro ko apne saamne amir hote dekhte rehna chahiye tha mujhe aur ye achanak nahi hua hai governor sahab yu kahiye ki time nahi mila fijul k media we din ka wait krna chahiye jab koi apna mere se jyada paise kama kar mujhe beijjat kar k chala jaaye jaan na hi hai suniye ek marwadi tha jo roj mere dukaan pe aata aur rupaye ki ek cut chai pi k
